sections.heading: Repealed.Section 24-2E-2 - Repealed.Section 24-2E-3 - Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 2001, ch. 136, § 1; repealed by Laws 2013, ch. 28, § 1.

Repealed.— Laws 2013, ch. 28, § 1 repealed 24-2E-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 2001, ch. 136, § 1, relating to testing of persons for hepatitis, consent not required, effective June 14, 2013. For provisions of former section,seethe 2012 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 2001, ch. 136, § 2; repealed by Laws 2013, ch. 28, § 2.

Repealed.— Laws 2013, ch. 28, § 1 repealed 24-2E-2 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 2001, ch. 136, § 2, relating to confidentiality, effective June 14, 2013. For provisions of former section,seethe 2012 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 2001, ch. 136, § 3; repealed by Laws 2013, ch. 28, § 1.

Repealed.— Laws 2013, ch. 28, § 1 repealed 24-2E-3 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 2001, ch. 136, § 3, relating to penalties, effective June 14, 2013. For provisions of former section,seethe 2012 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
